net.myorb.math.matrices

Interface MatrixAccess<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type on which operations are to be executed
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SimultaneousEquations.AugmentedMatrix<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractMatrixWrapper, AbstractOptimizedWrapper, Matrix, MinorMatrixComputationPool, MinorMatrixComputationTask, MinorMatrixWrapper, MinorMatrixWrapper, Primitives.VMatrix, Vandermonde, VandermondeChebyshev

    public interface MatrixAccess<T>
    principle methods used to represent access to matrix objects
    Author:
    Michael Druckman

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      build access to a set of minor matrix objects subordinate to this parent.

      wrap matrix representation in an optimized object

        MatrixAccess<T> getMinor(int row,
                         int column)
        build access to a set of minor matrix objects subordinate to this parent.
        Parameters:
        row - the row number to be eliminated
        column - the column number chosen
        Returns:
        access to the minor matrix

      • getMinor

        MinorAccess<T> getMinor(int column)
        build access to a set of minor matrix objects subordinate to this parent.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        access to the minor matrix set of rows
